title: Chaos vs order even What to do with keys???
body: What do you do with keys???I see anni skin activatable for 675 essence but I don't know what to do with my 2 keys  someone please explain to me.

replies.body:
The [**VS Event ended back on 6/29**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/events/vs-2017), but if you still have any remaining tokens you can still craft those into the event items until 7/24. 

The keys and key fragments you've been getting are used to open **Hextech Chests**. Hit up [**this handy little guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) for some info and feel free to shoot me any other questions you might have!

Sorry I'm kinda really new can you just explain exactly what to click?
Is 2 keys not enough to do anything or like what because I don't know what to do with them.
Those keys are used to open Hextech Chests. I went ahead and checked your account, and you don't currently have any chests so you won't be able to use the keys.

Thanks um I would just like to say as a new player this whole thing has been really confusing  and would like to suggest making it more clear I watched the videos about the event and they didn't explain this clearly.

Ahhhhh so you were watching the Order vs Chaos Event video? That event dealt with the tokens specifically so it didn't really go over the basics of Hextech Loot and Crafting. Check out [**this website**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html) for all the info you need to understand how our loot system works ^_^! 

Feel free to let me know if you have any other questions that page didn't answer.
